name: RamayanaQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open ramayana quiz”
”Alexa, start ramayana quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ramayana quiz
des: This quiz is a fun game that will teach you more about Ramayana and about the life of Lord Rama. Discover unknown facts about the first Hindu epic, and test your knowledge in a fun game with your family
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
